title: Cluster Spacecraft 1 FluxGate Magnetometer (FGM) Spin-Resolution Parameters - Andre Balogh>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk & Elizabeth Lucek>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk & ESA CAA (Imperial College)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'time_tags__C1_CP_FGM_SPIN' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/cluster/c1/cp/2001/c1_cp_fgm_spin_20010130_v01.cdf. The most common cadence, 4003 [ms] = PT4.003S, occurred for 51.5385% of the 536 timesteps.
